contents.text: Welcome to Nuna, your partner in making healthcare more affordable through data analytics.
For new client inquiries and product information, press 1.
For a product demo and solution overview, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our solutions specialist.

navigationGoals: I need to schedule a product demo to evaluate Nuna’s analytics solution.
I’d like a demo of Nuna’s healthcare analytics platform for our veteran support program.
I’d like a deep-dive demo of your data analytics platform’s API endpoints and ingestion pipeline performance.
I’d like to schedule a demo of your analytics solution so I can understand how it works.
I’d like to schedule a demo to see how Nuna’s analytics can support my healthcare cost research.

contents.text: For partnership opportunities and strategic alliances, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our partnerships team.

navigationGoals: I want to explore forming a strategic partnership with Nuna.
I want to discuss forming a strategic partnership between my veterans nonprofit and Nuna.
I want to explore a strategic integration partnership to embed your predictive analytics engine into our EMR workflow.
I represent a senior center and want to discuss partnership opportunities with your company.
I’m exploring partnership opportunities for a university project analyzing healthcare data.

contents.text: For existing client support and account services, press 2.
For technical support and platform assistance, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to technical support.

navigationGoals: I need help troubleshooting my Nuna analytics platform.
I’m an existing client and need technical help integrating my veterans’ medical data into the platform.
I need assistance troubleshooting OAuth authentication errors on my Nuna analytics account.
I’m having trouble accessing my account and need technical assistance with the platform.
I’m an existing client and need help troubleshooting my API integration with Nuna’s platform.

contents.text: For billing inquiries and account management, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our billing department.

navigationGoals: I want to clarify a billing charge and update my account payment.
I need to review and dispute my latest billing charges for our healthcare analytics account.
I’d like to reconcile my usage-based billing charges and adjust my subscription tier for next quarter.
I have questions about my recent invoice and need help understanding my billing charges.
I’m an existing client with questions about my subscription invoice and payment details.
